title: U.S. Tries To Slow Migrant Flow From Honduras
teaser: In an effort to stem the flow of children to the U.S., the State Department is funding media campaigns in Honduras. Cindy Carcamo of the Los Angeles Times talks with NPR's Arun Rath about the tactic.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
